questions.question: What is 5 + 3 × 4 - 2?
questions.hint: Which operation has the highest priority here? Handle that first!

questions.question: What is 24 ÷ (3 + 5) × 2?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then work left to right for division and multiplication.

questions.question: What is 15 - 3 × 2 + 8 ÷ 4?
questions.hint: Handle both multiplication and division first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is (12 - 4) × (6 + 2)?
questions.hint: Solve both parentheses first. What do you get when you multiply those results?

questions.question: What is 36 ÷ 6 + 4 × 5 - 3?
questions.hint: Division and multiplication have equal priority. Do them first, left to right.

questions.question: What is 7 × (9 - 4) + 12 ÷ 3?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! Then multiply and divide, then add.

questions.question: What is 100 - 8 × 10 + 15?
questions.hint: Multiplication before addition and subtraction. What is 8 × 10?

questions.question: What is (5 + 7) × 3 - (8 - 2)?
questions.hint: Solve both sets of parentheses first, then multiply, then subtract.

questions.question: What is 48 ÷ 8 ÷ 2 × 3?
questions.hint: All same level - work strictly left to right!

questions.question: What is 6 + 4 × (10 - 3) - 5?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then multiplication, then addition and subtraction.

questions.question: What is 72 ÷ (4 + 5) + 7 × 2?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! Then handle division and multiplication before adding.

questions.question: What is 3 × 3 + 4 × 4 - 5?
questions.hint: Do both multiplications first, then add, then subtract.

questions.question: What is 50 - (12 + 8) × 2?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then multiply, then subtract from 50.

questions.question: What is 9 × 6 ÷ 3 + 7?
questions.hint: Multiply and divide left to right first, then add.

questions.question: What is (15 - 6) × (4 + 2) ÷ 9?
questions.hint: Solve both parentheses, then multiply, then divide.

questions.question: What is 8 + 6 × 7 - 20 ÷ 4?
questions.hint: Multiplication and division first! Then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is 64 ÷ 8 + 5 × (3 + 1)?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then division and multiplication, then add.

questions.question: What is 11 × 4 - 6 × 6?
questions.hint: Do both multiplications first, then find the difference.

questions.question: What is (30 - 12) ÷ 6 + 4 × 3?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then division and multiplication, then add.

questions.question: What is 5 × 5 - 3 × 3 + 2 × 2?
questions.hint: All three multiplications first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is 90 ÷ (5 + 4) × 2?
questions.hint: Parentheses first! What is 5 + 4? Then divide and multiply left to right.

questions.question: What is 7 + 8 × 3 - 6 ÷ 2?
questions.hint: Multiplication and division before addition and subtraction.

questions.question: What is (4 + 6) × (8 - 3) + 5?
questions.hint: Both parentheses first, then multiply, then add.

questions.question: What is 81 ÷ 9 × 4 - 8?
questions.hint: Division and multiplication left to right first, then subtract.

questions.question: What is 12 × 3 - 4 × 5 + 6?
questions.hint: Both multiplications first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is (25 - 10) × 4 ÷ 6?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then multiply and divide left to right.

questions.question: What is 6 × 8 - 24 ÷ 3 + 5?
questions.hint: Multiply and divide first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is 100 - (15 + 25) ÷ 8?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then divide, then subtract from 100.

questions.question: What is 4 × 4 × 2 + 3 × 3?
questions.hint: All multiplications first, then add the results.

questions.question: What is 56 ÷ 7 + 9 × (6 - 2)?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then division and multiplication, then add.

questions.question: What is (18 + 6) ÷ 4 × 5?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then divide and multiply left to right.

questions.question: What is 8 × 9 - 7 × 8?
questions.hint: Both multiplications first, then find the difference.

questions.question: What is 45 ÷ 5 + 6 × 4 - 10?
questions.hint: Division and multiplication first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is 3 × (8 + 4) - 2 × 7?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then both multiplications, then subtract.

questions.question: What is 60 ÷ (3 + 2) × 4?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then divide and multiply left to right.

questions.question: What is 9 + 5 × 6 - 3 × 4?
questions.hint: Both multiplications first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is (7 × 6 - 12) ÷ 5?
questions.hint: Inside the parentheses: multiply first, then subtract. Then divide.

questions.question: What is 10 × 7 - 8 × 6 + 4?
questions.hint: Both multiplications first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is 84 ÷ 12 + 5 × (9 - 3)?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then division and multiplication, then add.

questions.question: What is (11 + 4) × (12 - 8) - 20?
questions.hint: Both parentheses first, then multiply, then subtract.
